author: rcm
msg: PojoAdapter now ensures that any access that requires a resolved object will now force the resolving of its object before the request is forwarded to the reflection layer.

author: rcm
msg: Skipping lines starting with a hash (#)

author: rcm
msg: Moved the setting of the resovled flag in an object to before the call to the object store.  This ensures that any recursive resolving will not attempt to resovlve the same object in an infinite loop.

author: rcm
msg: Moved the text content classes to their own package.
